metadata.title: Per capita income increased by 9.7pc in FY 2024-25

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 9 (APP):The per capita income increased by 9.7 percent during the fiscal year 2024-25 as compared to the last fiscal year, according to the Pakistan Economic Survey 2024-25 launched by Federal Minister for Finance and Revenue, Senator Muhammad Aurangzeb here Monday. The per capita income reached at $1,824 during FY 2024-25 as compared to the $1,662 during the last fiscal year, supported by the improved economic activity and stable exchange rate.
